original: Assmundson, Per Gunnar, tandläkare, Ljungskile, f. 26/6/07 i Gbg av skeppsred. A. Th. Assmundson o. Gerda Maria Hansson. G. 37 m. Kerstin Elisabeth Abrahamsson. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs h. latinlärov. 26, tandl :kand. 27, tandläkare 32. Praktik först i Hälleviksstrand o. numera i Ljungskile, därjämte ett stort antal förordn. som skoltandl. i olika socknar. V. ordf. i Västra Morlanda RK-krets 33-45, ordf. i HäMeviks&trands IF 35-37, i Hälleviksistrands tennis-klubb 37-45.
translated: Assmundson, Per Gunnar, dentist, Ljungskile, born June 26th, 1907 in Gothenburg to shipowner A. Th. Assmundson and Gerda Maria Hansson. Married for 37 years to Kerstin Elisabeth Abrahamsson. He graduated from Goteborgs Hogre Latinläroverk in 1926, received his dental degree in 1927, and became a licensed dentist in 1932. He first worked in Hälleviksstrand and now practices in Ljungskile, in addition to holding several appointments as a school dentist in different parishes. He was vice-chairman of the Västra Morlanda Rotary Club district 33-45, chairman of the HäMeviks&trands Sports Club 35-37, and chairman of the Hälleviksistrands Tennis Club 37-45.
